name: (CHAPTER 2!) Space Kitty's!
description:
EPIC KITTY SPACE SHOOTER!

Chapter 2! HUGE UPDATE!

Mage Kitty Skin (Dragon is still there when you press changed but will be changed soon)

Magic ball texture on the healthpack

Like the BIGGEST PART OF IT!

THE MAP IS LIKE 5 TIMES BIGGER AND IS NOW MORE FUN!!!!!!!!!!!!

Boss sizes changed

WAY MORE ENEMIES! 

BETTER GAMEPLAY!

and Thanks! make sure to have internet explorer and turned off block pop ups!

that's it for the update! :D
